Lourdes and I are deeply saddened by the loss of our good friend Gus Machado. Gus was a Cuban patriot and strong advocate for freedom. He made a huge impact in the South Florida community and will be missed by everyone who knew him. We are praying for his wife, Lilliam, & family.
